metadata.title: USN-6833-1 -- VTE vulnerability
metadata.description: Siddharth Dushantha discovered that VTE incorrectly handled large window resize escape sequences. An attacker could possibly use this issue to consume resources, leading to a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6833-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  gir1.2-vte-2.91 - 0.74.0-2ubuntu0.1 gir1.2-vte-3.91 - 0.74.0-2ubuntu0.1 libvte-2.91-0 - 0.74.0-2ubuntu0.1 libvte-2.91-common - 0.74.0-2ubuntu0.1 libvte-2.91-dev - 0.74.0-2ubuntu0.1 libvte-2.91-doc - 0.74.0-2ubuntu0.1 libvte-2.91-gtk4-0 - 0.74.0-2ubuntu0.1 libvte-2.91-gtk4-dev - 0.74.0-2ubuntu0.1 libvte-2.91-gtk4-doc - 0.74.0-2ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
